Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to install the "arcgis" module using "pip install -U arcgis" and added the correct path to the system path using "export PATH=$PATH:/. However, when attempting to generate a river map using the module, I received a ModuleNotFoundError. I attempted to add the path to the system path again, but this did not work. I then tried installing the module using "pip install arcgis" and added the path to the system path again, but still received the same error. I also checked the version of Python being used and it is Python 3. I attempted to generate the river map again, but still received the same error.
"""

Latest Development:
